actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress regarding the deployment in the Persian Gulf conflict of troops of the United States Armed Forces who are members of the same family.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Secretary of Defense should apply to the Persian Gulf conflict the former policy of the Department of Defense not to deploy to the same unit more than one member of a family or to the theater of the conflict both parents of a family with young children or the last surviving member of a family line.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress regarding the deployment in the Persian Gulf conflict of troops of the United States Armed Forces who are members of the same family.
